page.title: 09A day in the life of........
page.content: I get up at 7.30 and usually have Special K for breakfast.While my mum ties my hairs I watch T.V.a.m.I try to {get to school early so I can be in the early morning computer club. After assembly we do basic work.At playtime I help with the crisps and {then we play British Bulldog.In this game one player stands in the middle of the playground and the others have to run past without being ticked. In the afternoon we have more basic work and Welsh with the travelling teacher.Afterwards I have craft which I enjoy very much. After school I go to Emma's to play. We put on the loud music because her mum and dad are at work.We dance to Wham but we look through the curtains in case they come home early.I go to bed about 9.30. .
